lines.text: Julia! You're in love with him! Well, I pity you.
I'm beginning to wonder, cousin Barnabas, if I shall ever know you at all. There's so much about you... that I'm dying to know.
We were all very surprised that you've decided to settle in Collinsport.
When you know me better, you won't be.
Vampirism is not a disease, Julia. Vampires are the living dead.
What about the others - and the death of Carolyn Stoddard? Are we simply to forgive and forget those merely because you're attempting to cure the monster responsible?
Every wedding needs a witness. And you will be witness to this one.
I can cure you. I can make you a normal human being.
The Madonnas rest high above / The lion's head watches the dove / And in the womb beneath the hill / A blazing light grows bright and still.
If I told the police that the creature they're looking for lives by night, and sleeps in a coffin by day... they might question my sanity.
You went to her, and tried to warn her about me! You betrayed me, Willie!
You'll be making a serious mistake if you pursue this, Professor.
Alright, Loomis, you can pick up your pay in the morning.
Alright, I'll get my pay, in the morning-but I'll get a lot more than that... before then!

[Taunting Jeff Clark]
Every wedding needs a witness and you will be witness to this one.
